response.original_title: Как живет старейшая эротическая газета России
response.overview: Remember Speed-Info, Russia’s iconic erotic tabloid from the 1990s?  It’s still being printed — and we went inside the newsroom to find out how it survives, who writes it, and what keeps this relic of the post-Soviet press alive.  An intimate look at the people behind Russia’s oldest erotic newspaper — part nostalgia, part absurdity, and part journalistic curiosity.
response.tagline: What’s left of the sex press?
response.title: Inside Russia’s Oldest Erotic Newspaper
